GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.36 to before v5.15.77
GSD.description:
mmc: core: Fix kernel panic when remove non-standard SDIO card

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.77 by commit 1e8cd93ae536581562bab4e1d8c5315bbc2548bf, it was introduced in version v2.6.36 by commit 6f51be3d37dff73cf8db771df4169f4c2f1cbf66. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: mmc: core: Fix kernel panic when remove non-standard SDIO card
